p: Epigallocatechin gallate is found in high quantity in tea ( Camellia sinensis), especially in the form of green tea. The best binding position of this compound against S protein was −9.8 and against M pro was −7.8. It has been reported previously that this compound was able to inhibit the proteolytic activity of SARS-CoV 3CL pro [ 126]. Although it does not meet the Ro5 and its oral availability is low, it has immunomodulatory and anti-inflammatory activities [ 127, 128].
